sniperZ.description: Shoot an enemy for <y>250% damage.</c> Reactivate the ability to <y>reload your weapon</c>, granting <y>bonus damage</c> if timed correctly.

sniperX.name: Steady Aim
sniperX.description: Carefully take aim, <y>increasing damage the longer the button is held down.</c> On release, fire a bullet for <y>up to 2000% damage.</c>

sniperC.name: Military Training
sniperC.description:
<y>Backflip</c> a large distance.
You <b>cannot be hit</c> while rolling.

sniperV.name: Spotter: SCAN
sniperV.description: Send your Spotter out to <y>analyze the most dangerous enemy</c>, increasing <y>critical strike chance</c> against it by <y>100%.</c>

sniperVBoosted.name: Spotter: ISOLATE
sniperVBoosted.description: Send your Spotter out to <y>analyze the most dangerous enemy</c>, <b>slowing</c> and increasing <y>critical strike chance</c> against it by <y>100%.</c>

sniperVRecall.name: Spotter: RECALL
sniperVRecall.description: Cancel the current Spotter operation, returning it to you.

sniperZReload.name: Reload
sniperZReload.description: Reload your sniper rifle, gaining <y>30-60% bonus damage</c> if timed in the colored zone.

sniperZ2.name: Improvise
sniperZ2.description: Swing your rifle in front of you, dealing <y>120% damage</c> and knocking enemies back.

sniperX2.name: Quickscope
sniperX2.description:
Rapidly take aim, <y>dealing damage within a moving reticle</c>.
On release, fire a bullet for <y>600% damage.</c>

sniperC2.name: Heavy Recoil
sniperC2.description: <y>Fire at the ground,</c> launching yourself up and away. Deals <y>200% damage</c>.

acridZ.name: Festering Wounds
acridZ.description: Maul an enemy for <y>120% damage</c>. The target is poisoned for <y>24% damage per second.</c>

acridX.name: Neurotoxin
acridX.description: Spit toxic bile for <y>220% damage</c>, <y>stunning enemies</c> in a line for 1 second.

acridC.name: Caustic Sludge
acridC.description: Secrete <y>poisonous sludge</c> for 2 seconds. <b>Speeds up allies,</c> while <y>slowing and hurting enemies</c> for <y>90% damage.</c>

acridV.name: Epidemic
acridV.description: Release a <y>deadly disease</c>, poisoning enemies for <y>100% damage per second</c>. The contagion <b>spreads to two targets</c> after 1 second.

acridVBoosted.name: Pandemic
acridVBoosted.description: Release a <y>deadly disease</c>, poisoning enemies for <y>100% damage per second</c>. The contagion <b>spreads to two targets</c> after 1 second. If an enemy is killed by Pandemic, <b>you are healed</c>.

acridZ2.name: Corrosive Wounds
acridZ2.description: Maul enemies for <y>80% damage</c>. Targets are corroded, and take <y>10% extra damage</c> from all sources.

acridX2.name: Toxic Bubble
acridX2.description:
Spit out a Toxic Bubble, dealing <y>60% damage over time</c>, and slowing enemies, exploding for <y>600% damage</c> after 5 seconds. 
Can be pushed by attacking.

acridC2.name: Dissolving Ambush
acridC2.description: Spit out a <y>poisonous blob</c>, forming a puddle that <y>slows and hurts enemies</c> for <y>100% damage.</c> Use a second time to dissolve into acid and <b>warp to the puddle</c>, dealing <y>400% damage.</c>

mercenaryZ.name: Laser Sword
mercenaryZ.description: Slash in front of you, damaging up to <y>3 enemies</c> for <y>130% damage.</c>

mercenaryX.name: Whirlwind
mercenaryX.description: Quickly slice twice, dealing <y>2x80% damage</c> to all nearby enemies.

mercenaryC.name: Blinding Assault
mercenaryC.description: <y>Dash forwards,</c> stunning enemies for <y>120% damage</c>. If you hit an enemy, <b>you can dash again<y>, up to 3 times.

mercenaryV.name: Eviscerate
mercenaryV.description:
Target the nearest enemy, attacking them for <y>6x110% damage</c>.
<b>You cannot be hit for the duration.</c>

mercenaryVBoosted.name: Massacre
mercenaryVBoosted.description:
Target the nearest enemy, attacking them for <y>6x110% damage</c>. 
<b>You cannot be hit for the duration</c>. Refreshes duration on kills, jumping to nearby enemies.

mercenaryX2.name: Focused Strike
mercenaryX2.description: Hold to sheathe your weapon. Release before an incoming strike to <y>parry</c> enemy attacks for <y>500%-1000% damage<c> to all nearby enemies.

mercenaryC2.name: Skyward Assault
mercenaryC2.description: <y>Dash upwards</c> damaging enemies for <y>200% damage</c>. Press again to <y>slam down for 400% damage</c>.

mercenaryV2.name: After-Image
mercenaryV2.description:
Focus briefly, channeling energy into an after-image. <b>All attacks are doubled</c> for three seconds. 
Stacks twice.

mercenaryV2Boosted.name: Between Time
mercenaryV2Boosted.description:
Focus briefly, channeling energy into multiple clones. <b>All attacks are quadrupled</c> for five seconds. 
Stacks twice.

loaderZ.name: Knuckleboom
loaderZ.description: Batter nearby enemies for <y>120% damage</c>. Every third hit deals <y>240% damage</c> and <y>knocks enemies upwards</c>.

loaderX.name: Debris Shield
loaderX.description: Become <g>invincible for 2 seconds</c> while also <b>increasing your movement speed.</c>

loaderC.name: Hydraulic Gauntlet
loaderC.description:
Fire your gauntlet and <y>pull yourself</c> forward, <y>stunning and hurting enemies for 210% damage.</c>
Can be angled <b>upwards</c>.

loaderV.name: M440 Conduit
loaderV.description: Place a <y>lightning rod</c>. After placing two, lightning surges between them, dealing <y>80% damage per second</c> for 9 seconds.

loaderVBoosted.name: M700X Discharge Conduit
loaderVBoosted.description: Place a <y>lightning rod</c>. After placing two, lightning surges between them, dealing <y>80% damage per second</c> for 9 seconds and <y>stunning</c> initial enemies.

loaderZ2.name: Bullet Punch
loaderZ2.description: Charge up and slam enemies forward, for <y>up to 1000% damage.</c>

loaderX2.name: Short Circuit
loaderX2.description: Crash down and <y>stun</c> enemies in a large radius, for <y>350% damage</c>.

loaderV2.name: S260 Conduit
loaderV2.description: Place a <y>lightning beacon.</c> Lightning surges to any nearby allies within a radius, dealing <y>80% damage per second</c>, and <y>massively increasing attack speed.</c>

loaderV2Boosted.name: S260 Overload Conduit
loaderV2Boosted.description: Place a <y>lightning beacon.</c> Lightning surges to any nearby allies within a large radius, dealing <y>80% damage per second</c>, and <y>massively increasing attack speed.</c>

chefZ.name: DICE
chefZ.description: THROW CLEAVER TOWARDS CUSTOMERS FOR <y>100% DAMAGE.</c> BOOMERANGS BACK.

chefX.name: SEAR
chefX.description:
COOK CUSTOMERS FOR 260% DAMAGE UNTIL GOLDEN BROWN, <y>KNOCKING THEM AWAY.</c>
SEARING GLAZED CUSTOMERS DEALS <y>+78% DAMAGE AND STUNS.</c>

chefC.name: GLAZE
chefC.description: RIDE A WAVE OF OIL, <b>SLOWING CUSTOMERS.</c>

chefV.name: SECOND HELPING
chefV.description: PREPARE A MASTER MEAL, <lt>BOOSTING THE NEXT ABILITY CAST.</c>

chefVBoosted.name: FULL COURSE MEAL
chefVBoosted.description: PREPARE A MASTER MEAL, BOOSTING THE NEXT TWO ABILITY CASTS.

chefZEmpowered.name: MINCE
chefZEmpowered.description: THROW 9 CLEAVERS IN A CIRCLE FOR 9x100% DAMAGE. BOOMERANGS BACK.

chefXEmpowered.name: FLAMBE
chefXEmpowered.description: COOK CUSTOMERS FOR 420% UNTIL INCINERATED, KNOCKING THEM AWAY.

chefCEmpowered.name: MARINATE
chefCEmpowered.description: RIDE A WAVE OF OIL, SLOWING CUSTOMERS. SEARING GLAZED CUSTOMERS DEALS +78% DAMAGE AND STUNS.

chefZ2.name: SLICE
chefZ2.description: STRETCH YOUR ARMS AND SLASH CUSTOMERS FOR <y>120% DAMAGE.</c>

chefC2.name: OIL JAR
chefC2.description: TOSS OUT A FRAGILE JAR OF OIL, SPREADING AND <b>SLOWING CUSTOMERS.</c> <y>SLIDE WHILE IN OIL.</c>

chefV2.name: COOK
chefV2.description: RAPIDLY PREPARE MEAL OUT OF CUSTOMERS FOR <y>6x80% DAMAGE</c>. SLAIN CUSTOMERS BECOME <b>TASTY TEMPORARY MEAL ITEMS</c>. <r>CANNOT CRIT</c>.

chefZ2Empowered.name: BUTCHER
chefZ2Empowered.description: FIERCELY TEAR CUSTOMERS APART, DEALING <y>625% DAMAGE.</c>

chefC2Empowered.name: MARINATE
chefC2Empowered.description:
TOSS OUT A LARGE FRAGILE JAR OF OIL, SPREADING AND <b>SLOWING CUSTOMERS.</c> <y>SLIDE WHILE IN OIL.</c>
NOTE: MOP UP MASSIVE MESS DURING BREAK.

chefV2Boosted.name: BUFFET
chefV2Boosted.description: RAPIDLY PREPARE MEAL OUT OF CUSTOMERS FOR <y>12x80% DAMAGE</c>. SLAIN CUSTOMERS BECOME <b>TASTY TEMPORARY MEAL ITEMS</c>. <r>CANNOT CRIT</c>.

pilotZ.name: Clusterfire
pilotZ.description: Fire weapon for <y>95% damage</c>. Every third hit <y>pierces</c> and deals <y>190% damage</c>.

pilotX.name: Target Acquired!
pilotX.description: Shoot <y>diagonally upward</c> for <y>3x115% damage.</c> <b>If airborne</c>, shoot <y>downward</c> instead. <b>Hold</c> to fire continuously.

pilotC.name: Rapid Deployment
pilotC.description: Launch into the air, <y>stunning</c> enemies and activating a parachute. <b>If airborne</c>, launch forwards instead.

pilotV.name: Airstrike
pilotV.description: Dash backwards, leaving a bomb that knocks enemies into the air for <y>%150 damage</c>. <b>Can trigger multiple Times</c>. <b>If airborne</c>, dash upwards and drops a bomb directly below instead.

pilotVBoosted.name: Air Raid
pilotVBoosted.description: <b>Dash backwards</c>, leaving a bomb that knocks enemies up in the air for <y>%185 damage and stunning</c>. <b>Can trigger multiple Times</c>. <b>If airborne</c>, dash upwards and drops a bomb directly below instead.

pilotC2.name: Aerobatics
pilotC2.description:
Dash forwards, <y>briefly becoming invincible</c>.
Can <y>latch onto and climb walls</c> upon dashing onto one.

pilotV2.name: Aerial Support
pilotV2.description: <b>Mark</c> an enemy in front of you, launching an airstrike for <y>10x120% damage</c> over time.

pilotV2Boosted.name: Aerial Barrage
pilotV2Boosted.description: <b>Mark</c> an enemy in front of you, launching airstrike for <y>20x120% damage</c> over time.

artiZ.name: Flame Chakrams
artiZ.description: Toss out a chakram for <y>45% damage</c>. Hits up to 5 times at its peak and <y>ignites</c> for a stacking <y>10% damage over time</c>, before returning.

artiX.name: Charged Nanobomb
artiX.description: <b>Charge up</c> and launch an electric bomb for <y>180%-600% damage</c>, <b>stunning</c> enemies in range.

artiC.name: Frost Barrier
artiC.description: Create a wall of ice that <b>blocks most enemies</c> and distracts them. When broken, <y>explodes and freezes enemies for 100% damage.</c>

artiV.name: Flamethrower
artiV.description: Burn enemies in front of you for <y>10x80% damage</c> and <y>ignites</c> them for <y>20% damage over time.</c>

artiVBoosted.name: Incinerator
artiVBoosted.description: Burn enemies in front of you for <y>12x100% damage</c> and <y>ignites</c> them for <y>30% damage over time.</c>

artiX2.name: Pulse Spear
artiX2.description:
Toss an electric spear for <y>300% damage.</c> Cast again mid-flight to <b>pulse</c> the spear, allowing it to briefly pierce through enemies. 
Successful pierces refresh your ability to <b>pulse</c>.

artiC2.name: Tectonic Surge
artiC2.description:
Shatter the earth below you, <b>launching you into the air.</c> Cast mid-air to create a <y>temporary platform to stand on.</c>
Gravity is reduced briefly afterward.

artiV2.name: Localized Sun
artiV2.description: Summon a miniature, <b>movement tracking</c> star, dealing <y>120% damage</c> over time. Explodes for <y>1000% damage</c> after 5 seconds.

artiV2Boosted.name: Binary Star
artiV2Boosted.description: Summon two miniature, <b> movement tracking</c> stars, dealing <y>120% damage</c> over time. Both explode for <y>2x1000% damage</c> after 5 seconds.

drifterZ.name: Blunt Force
drifterZ.description: 3-hit Combo, hit enemies in a wide range for <y>120%-240% damage</c>. Each hit in the combo has an added chance to generate <b>scrap.</c>

drifterX.name: Cleanup
drifterX.description: Toss out some of your spare <b>scrap</c>, spawning 4 bouncing, <y>piercing</c> projectiles for <y>55% damage</c> each. Small Chance to spawn <b>special projectiles</c>.

drifterC.name: Suffocate
drifterC.description: Slam enemies with your bag for <y>200% damage</c>, and <y>stunning</c> them. If the enemy is under 20% health, <r>Consume</c> them; converting them into <b>scrap.</c>

drifterV.name: Salvage
drifterV.description: Consume a large amount of <b>scrap</c> to spawn <y>4</c> <b>temporary</c> <y>items</c>.

drifterVBoosted.name: Recover
drifterVBoosted.description: Consume a large amount of <b>scrap</c> to spawn <y>6</c> <b>temporary</c> <y>items</c>.

drifterX2.name: Scrap Cube
drifterX2.description:
Consume a <b>small amount of scrap</c> and toss out a large <y>scrap cube</c>. 
The cube can be pushed and shattered, dealing <y>150% damage</c> while pushed. Fragile!

drifterC2.name: Tornado Slam
drifterC2.description:
Spin around wildly, slamming enemies with your bag for <y>100% damage</c>.
<y>Increases your speed</c> and <y>lowers your gravity</c>.

drifterV2.name: Recycle
drifterV2.description: Consume a large amount of <b>scrap</c> to <y>re-roll a pickup</c>.

drifterV2Boosted.name: Rebuild
drifterV2Boosted.description: Consume a large amount of <b>scrap</c> to <y>re-roll a pickup</c>, and an additional <b>temporary copy</c>.

robomandoX.name: DE-ESCALATE
robomandoX.description: FIRE A SMALL ELECTRICAL CHARGE THAT <y>PIERCES ENEMIES</c> FOR <y>180% DAMAGE, STUNNING THEM.</c>

robomandoC.name: EVASIVE MANEUVER
robomandoC.description:
ATTEMPT TO <y>DIVE FORWARD</c> A SMALL DISTANCE.
YOU <b>CANNOT BE HIT</c> EARLY IN THE MANEUVER.

robomandoV.name: RE-WIRE
robomandoV.description: RE-WIRE A MECHANICAL OBJECT, <y>ACTIVATING IT FOR FREE.</c>

robomandoVBoosted.name: OVER-WIRE
robomandoVBoosted.description: RE-WIRE A <b>MECHANICAL OBJECT</c>, <y>ACTIVATING IT FOR FREE</c>, WITH A <y>20% CHANCE</c> TO <b>DOUBLE OUTPUT</c>.

chef.endQuote: ..and so it left, entirely forgetting its previous purpose.
chef.description: The <y>CHEF</c> is extremely proficient at dealing with large groups of customers. Combining a delicous <y>Glaze</c> with a finishing <y>Sear</c> is sure to dazzle even the toughest of crowds!
chef.name: CHEF
chef.story:
<ul>Warrantee Expiration:
4/10/2063

<ul>CHEF Included Manual:</c>
Thank you for purchasing the CHEF Model-A robotic kitchen assistant! Automated cooking has made rapid advancements in the last decade and our Model-A line of robots have been trained with the most recent in culinary AI datasets. CHEF models operate with very little oversight and adapt to the desires of your friends and family in only a day's worth of calibration! They can prepare meals efficiently with any provided ingredients and cookware or even improvise in a pinch! Perfect for your home, business or even on the road, you can utilize any of it's 8 included emotive pre-sets to align to your tastes in a hurry! Please refer to safety instructions for additional information.

<b>[SAFETY INSTRUCTIONS]</c>
<ul>[1]</c> READ THE MANUAL BEFORE ATTEMPTING TO OPERATE.
<ul>[2]</c> Though product is water-resistant, do not immerse in water or any other liquids to avoid electric shock.
<ul>[3]</c> Do not attempt to manually fill oil stores. Overfilling oil stores may cause a fire hazard.
<ul>[4]</c> Keep all exhaust ports clear of any potential blockage to prevent combustion.
<ul>[5]</c> Do not place unauthorized biological* materials inside cooking bay.
<ul>[5a]</c> Refer to Mars humanity statutes for a complete list of unauthorized materials.

engineer.endQuote: ..and so he left, more steel and circuit than man.
engineer.description: The <y>Engineer</c> relies on <y>proper placement</c> of <y>Mines and Turrets</c>. Use <y>Tri-nade</c> and <y>Thermal Harpoons</c> to <y>hit enemies from safe areas.</c> Always place all your mines and turrets before activating the teleporter!
engineer.name: Engineer
engineer.story:
<ul>Passenger Details:
<y>[Civilian Class]

<ul>Luggage & Equipment:</c>
Passenger boarded with a modified CronTech cybernetic enhancement suit. Attached 'projectile launchers' have been welded in places and could not be removed by security personnel, so temporary electrical auto-nullifiers have been attached until landing. Individual also checked 4 large anti-ballistic crates into the loading bay, which showed heavy machinery in the preliminary security x-rays. Crates marked as containing 'de-activated security turrets', 'anti-personnel hardware', and a 'large experimental fission array'. All associated batteries were removed and stored in adjacent bays in automated lockboxes.

<b>[SECURITY RECALL]</c>
<ul>[Event G1]</c> Major blast occured in loading bay 4A, originating from the individual's largest crate, causing an automated lockdown which had to be manually resolved. Container shifted into bay 4B and placed behind all of the passenger's other loaded cargo.
<ul>[Event G2]</c> Passenger walked too close to generator room, causing applied electrical auto-nullifiers to suddenly remagnetize. Personnel summoned to remove passenger from door.
engineer.departure:
<y>Departure:</c>
Outpost Shipping & Transit,
Asteroid 94N,
Belt Num. 1900,
Sargasso System
engineer.arrival:
<y>Destination:</c>
Great Hope Station,
Great Hope,
Mars

sniper.endQuote: ..and so they left, the sound still ringing in deaf ears.
sniper.description: The <y>Sniper</c> is the ultimate boss killer. A perfect reload and a fully charged <y>Steady Aim</c>, along with <y>Spotter: SCAN</c>, can <y>one shot many bosses</c>. Try to stand in a preferable position where you can <y>charge Steady Aim for as long as possible.</c>
sniper.name: Sniper
sniper.story:
<ul>Passenger Details:
<y>[Military Class]

<ul>Luggage & Equipment:</c>
Soldier boarded with a standard military reconnaissance personnel uniform, a 2050-0 sniper rifle and a traditional surveillance drone. The rifle and drone were cleared by the military checkpoint ahead of boarding, though the passenger opted to keep the drone with their carry-on luggage. Passenger and military associates insisted that the rifle stay with their own personnel, but allowed the rifle to be unloaded before boarding, with rounds stored in an automated lockbox. The soldier's personal affects included energy cells, canned goods, and a package of cooling gel sheets.

<b>[SECURITY RECALL]</c>
<r>[Note S1a]</c> Contact Light personnel has been instructed by the Deimos military to not mention the conflict occuring currently in the Boron system.
<r>[Note S1b]</c> Contact Light personnel has been instructed by the Deimos military to delete records of additional hardware loaded alongside their soldier.
sniper.arrival:
<y>Destination:</c>
Fort Reason,
Belt Num.1053,
[REDACTED]
Boron System

miner.endQuote: ..and so he left, adrenaline still rushing through his veins.
miner.description: The <y>Miner</c> is a short range berserker with the ability to fire himself up for increased damage.  In order to survive you will have to balance heat gained from <y>Crush</c> with skill usage to maximize time spent <y>Scorching</c>!
miner.name: Miner
miner.story:
<ul>Passenger Details:
<y>[Civilian Class]

<ul>Luggage & Equipment:</c>
Passenger boarded with a weather-emergency graded exosuit and standardized heat protection mask, modified for additional vaccuum safety. Exosuit appeared to have taken significiant heat damage, but technically passed inspection. Passenger was warned about potential risk of suffocation in the case of a vaccuum event should the suit deteriorate further. Security personnel has allowed the individual to keep their pickaxe in their carry-on, as it was deemed too awkward to pose a legitimate threat as a weapon. United States identification was long out of date, but the worker's Holdout mining records verified their identity. Additional luggage included a lighter, receipts and a small photo album.

<b>[SECURITY RECALL]</c>
<ul>[No recorded events.]</c>
miner.arrival:
<y>Destination:</c>
Chicago Grand Terminal,
United States,
Earth

huntress.endQuote: ..and so she left, her soul still remaining on the planet.
huntress.description: The <y>Huntress</c> is extremely proficient at <y>'kiting'</c> (running and firing while remaining unhurt). Remember that <y>Laser Glaive</c> does the <y>highest damage on the last bounce</c>! <y>Blink</c> can be used to <y>reposition or re-aim abilities</c>, and <y>Cluster Bomb</c> can take out grouped up enemies at range.
huntress.name: Huntress
huntress.story:
<ul>Passenger Details:
<y>[Civilian Class]

<ul>Luggage & Equipment:</c>
Passenger boarded with Agile-Class Hunter armor. Warp drives were aged, but only posed a malfunctioning risk to the individual, and thus passed safety clearances. Carbon fiber components appear damaged but still within acceptible vaccuum-graded limits. Red coloration noted as in some sectors it signifies a potential mercenary for hire. Individual also boarded with a Lightbow and a Tri-Rang variant, both of which have been packed into automated lockboxes until arrival. Lightbow showed signs of modification, but due to civilians having to pack away weaponry, inspection was kept to E-Class standards. Tri-Rang variant rattles persistently inside of lockbox, but was accepted by both passenger and security personnel.

<b>[SECURITY RECALL]</c>
<ul>[Event H1]</c> Individual found scratching at lockbox seams. Automated security alerts were not triggered.
<ul>[Event H2]</c> Individual appears to only sleep 3 hours per night and often avoids line of sight with cameras.

acrid.endQuote: ..and so it left, with a new hunger; to be left alone.
acrid.description: <y>Acrid</c> deals <y>huge amounts of damage</c> after <y>stacking poisons</c> from his <y>Festering Wounds, Caustic Sludge, and Epidemic.</c> Try to <y>stun targets inside your Caustic Sludge</c> for maximum damage. Remember that you can fight at <y>both melee and range! </c>
acrid.name: Acrid
acrid.story:
<y>Shipping Details:</c>
<c_stack>SUBJECT #c25058</c>
Early genetic experimentation has led to the creation of larger creatures from test tubes in recent months. Entirely coded in-house, with no DNA baseline larger than 5% of any one pre-existing Adam subject, this creature that we have code-named 'ACRID' has shown more intelligence than any other baseless chimaera and almost as much intelligence as [redacted] chimaeras. Preliminary tests on the subject have been occuring for months now. It is genetically stable but displays erratic signs of violence, and is thus being shipped to your unit for further trials due to safety concerns. The crate is rated for biological weapon resistance, but is not recommended for animal use - Still, we believe Acrid should make it to you safely and we have no concerns of damage in transit due to the immense strength and resilience it has shown across multiple trial periods.

<ul>P.S. Good luck.</c>
acrid.departure:
<ul>Sent to:</c>
Wade Z.
EICO labs
City of Gold,
Earth

mercenary.endQuote: ..and so he left, never to become human again.
mercenary.description: The <y>Mercenary</c> deals fast damage while dodging incoming threats. <y>Whirlwind</c> can be used to stay in mid-air longer. Fit skills between <y>Blinding Assaults</c> to maximize time spent invincible.
mercenary.name: Mercenary
mercenary.story:
<ul>Passenger Details:
<y>[Business Class]

<ul>Luggage & Equipment:</c>
Passenger boarded with a Tacton branded YMI armorset and a high-velocity vibroblade. Though it passed inspection, the individual's armor was equipped with an electrical auto-nullifier due to Tacton armor being known for its offensive capabilities. The passenger insisted that the vibroblade would remain sheathed for the duration of the flight but for security reasons it was stored in an energy-resistant automated lockbox. Individual also boarded with an electrical frequency refiner, a spare set of Mushin shoulderpads, and replacement carbon fiber exhaust tubing. An additional dagger was requested to be taken in the carry-on, but after being denied the passenger left it at port.

<b>[SECURITY RECALL]</c>
<ul>[Note M1a]</c> Passenger's employer instructed UES personnel before boarding to 'allow him to be solitary'.
<ul>[Event M1]</c> Contracted commando instructs passenger to return to their quarters at gunpoint after violent outburst.
<ul>[Event M1]</c> Minor altercation between officer and mercenary-class passenger resulting in them being separated.

loader.endQuote: ..and so he left, ready to rebuild his life, brick by brick.
loader.description: The <y>Loader</c> is a high damage close combatant with a unique skill. <y>Hydraulic Gauntlet</c> can be used to rapidly reposition, or to place <y>Conduits</c> far apart. Use <y>Debris Shield</c> as a hit-and-run shield.
loader.name: Loader
loader.story:
<ul>Passenger Details:
<g>[Employee Class]

<ul>Employee Details:</c>
Each UES loader-class employee comes equipped with a state-of-the-art titanium exoskeleton capable of lifting up to 245 tons (Additional 90+ ton hauling capability with winch attachment). Modern advancements have made employment opportunities at UES accessible to any and all peoples regardless of size, strength, age, or species! All employees are responsible for maintenance of their patented exosuits and unauthorized use is defined and restricted as per UES Manual Guide p358-390. Employees aboard the UES Contact Light are permitted to wear Safety Yellow, Safety Blue, Safety Green, or Safety Red exosuits. Please report to bay safety personnel for more details pertaining to individual departure safety regulations.

<b>[SECURITY RECALL]</c>
<ul>[Event L1]</c> Employee requested early leave from the loading bay 50 minutes before departure. Request granted.
<ul>[Event L2]</c> Employee instructed to remove loader-class exoskeleton after being seen wearing it after-hours.
<ul>[Event L1a]</c> <ul>Employee observed taking additional lunch breaks.</c>
<ul>[Event L1b]</c> <ul>Employee observed inappropriately inspecting contents of cargo bay crates and containers.</c>

hand.endQuote: ..and so it left, servos pulsing with new life.
hand.description: NO MANUAL GIVEN FOR HAN-D MODEL.
hand.name: HAN-D
hand.story:
<ul>Warrantee Expiration:
3/24/2046

<ul>Inputted Note:</c>
<ul>(ID #6E656F7246757574)</c>
Lost manual for HAN-D bot. We've had it around for a long time, I don't see any reason to update to a new model. I think most of the crew have grown attached to the big guy, the way its eye lights up and chirps almost makes you think it's friendly. Anyway, if you were referred to this note by me or someone else, all you need to know is to oil its joints once a month and don't get in its way when its in 'hallway duty' mode, because it can get aggressive with the mop. Keeps the place clean though.  Also I think something in the old manual referred to replacing the solar battery, but batteries for the old model tend to be hard to find.  We'll figure it out if he doesn't wake up someday.

-DO NOT REMOVE HAN-D FROM SHIP. Took YEARS to calibrate!

commando.endQuote: ..and so he left, with everything but his humanity.
commando.description: The <y>Commando</c> is a jack-of-all-trades character with the tools to deal with any situation. His high range and rate of fire provide great combat proficiency, while <y>Tactical Dive</c> grants increased survivability and mobility.
commando.name: Commando
commando.story:
<ul>Passenger Details:
<g>[Boarded per UES request for additional security.]

<ul>Luggage & Equipment:</c>
Contractor equipped with Standard MARCH Mk. II Commando armor. Built for light recoil, physical and energy-based projectile resistance, and minor space travel capabilities. Suit appended with intelligent biofoam dispensers and a lightweight solar battery. Notably, this unit has its AI component chip removed, with significant damage around the interface port. Individual also cleared two military grade semi-automatic pistols and one utility stagger blade. Stagger blade is to be held in carrying case at all times to prevent potential genetic damage in civilian passengers. Pistols cleared as standard, ammo provided on-board in multiple lockboxes.

<b>[SECURITY RECALL]</c>
<ul>[Event C1]</c> Individual requested cargo hold access to 'stretch their legs'. Hold access granted due to history with company.
<ul>[Event C2]</c> Individual granted access to captain's quarters under request of captain.
commando.departure:
<y>Departure:</c>
Alpha Base,
New Appalachian Crest,
Mars
commando.arrival:
<y>Destination:</c>
[Round Trip]
Alpha Base,
New Appalachian Crest,
Mars

enforcer.endQuote: ..and so he left, mutated beyond recognition.
enforcer.description: The <y>Enforcer</c> is a slow, but powerful character. Batting away enemies with <y>Shield Slam</c> guarantees you will keep enemies at a safe range. Make sure to use <y>Protect and Serve</c> against walls to prevent enemies from flanking you.
enforcer.name: Enforcer
enforcer.story:
<ul>Passenger Details:
<y>[Business Class]

<ul>Luggage & Equipment:</c>
Officer boarded with 2055 Heavy-SWAT variant police gear, an SDN standardized auto-shotgun (with grenade launcher attachment), and a vaccuum-grade blast shield. All equipment recently granted and cleared ahead of time by Old Alcatraz's Department of Migrations and Transfers. Security clearance granted to carry firearm at all times, though spacefaring laws puts officers outside of primary jurisdictions. Officer also boarded with a satchel containing personal affects including training weights, a selection of books, and a jumprope, all cleared by security at boarding. 

<b>[SECURITY RECALL]</c>
<ul>[Event E1]</c> Officer's serviceman ID lacked a name, but the numerical ID# was accepted by the identification archival system as a prior passenger.
<ul>[Event E2]</c> Minor altercation between officer and mercenary-class passenger resulting in them being separated.

bandit.endQuote: ..and so he left, with his pyrrhic plunder.
bandit.description: The <y>Bandit</c> fires <y>Blast</c> faster if you press faster! Use <y>smokebomb</c> to either run away or to <y>stun many enemies at once</c>, followed by <y>Dynamite Toss</c>. Dealing a killing blow with <y>Lights Out</c> allows you to chain many skills together, allowing for <y>maximum damage AND safety.</c>
bandit.name: Bandit
bandit.story:
<ul>Passenger Details:
<r>[Unregistered Occupant]

<ul>Security Analysis:</c>
Occupant appears to have hidden in cargo bay for potentially weeks since the point of detection. They appear to be wearing Stealth-Class Hunter armor alongside a leather jacket, hat and boots. Subject appears equipped with a mid-range rifle and a dated revolver. Rifle is unidentifiable from security footage but appears to be an light-energy variant. Since detection, occupant has appeared and disappeared from cargo bay without detection from passengers or personnel. Hired security has been instructed to detain the occupant but has been unsuccessful in doing so, as no contact has been made. Personnel has been instructed independently that if they see any unfamiliar armed passengers to not engage and inform the captain.

<b>[SECURITY RECALL]</c>
<ul>[Event B1]</c> Occupant detected in cargo bay, shining their rifle. Shortly after noticing the camera, the recording cuts out.
<ul>[Event B2]</c> Silhouetted shadows begin appearing in the second cargo bay. No associated bodies appear on camera, even in open areas.
<ul>[Event B3]</c> Contracted commando hears rapid mechanical whirring during their shift. Source undetermined.
bandit.departure:
<y>Point of Detection:</c>
32 hours Post Liftoff
Jupiterian Atmosphere

pilot.endQuote: ..and so he left, with his dreams of the sky below.
pilot.description: The <y>Pilot</c> is an airborne fighter that excels at raining damage from above. With the strong recoil of his weaponry and <y>Rapid Deployment</c> of his parachute, he can leap high into the sky to ready for a precision <y>Airstrike</c>.
pilot.name: Pilot
pilot.story:
<ul>Passenger Details:
<g>[Employee Class]

<ul>Employee Details:</c>
United Enterprise Shipping invites pilots from across the known universe to apply to our Preferred Pilot Enhanced Commissions program! Benefits include access to cybernetic impact augmentations for easier landings, Weapons and Securities certification programs, and luxurious vacation opportunities! (Applicants expected to apply 5 years in advance of flight operations. Cybernetics not guaranteed to all program participants. Weapons and Securities certificates only valid through UES employment. All opportunities are listed as-is and no further gratuities, opportunities or benefits are to be assumed regardless of updates to space maritime law on participating planets.)

<b>[SECURITY RECALL]</c>
<ul>[Event P1]</c> Employee briefly lost consciousness while manning ship. Auto-pilot engaged and woke employee.
<ul>[Event P2]</c> <r>[OVERRIDE]</c> SOS HULL BEING RAPIDLY APPROACHED BY UNKNOWN VIOLENT ENTITIES. LOCATION UNLISTED PLANET V. EJECT BLACK BOX, DESTINATION MARS BASE.

arti.endQuote: ..and so she left, passions faded to an ember.
arti.description: The <y>Artificer</c> uses her elemental abilities to defeat her enemies with precision.  By raising <y>Frost Barriers</c>, she's able to keep foes at bay in order to prepare <y>Charged Nanobombs</c>, or to escape into the optimal range for her flurry of <y>Flame Chakrams</c>.
arti.name: Artificer
arti.story:
<ul>Passenger Details:
<y>[Business Class]

<ul>Luggage & Equipment:</c>
High Court passenger equipped with standard ENV suit. Due to UES relations with the High Court and its donors, both the ENV suit itself and the individual's carry-on have had security checks waived. Passenger willingly attached electrical auto-nullifiers to both of their handheld generators, though lights remained active even after magnetized. Passenger requested to have various analytical devices scanned and recorded through security gates, though the exact nature of these devices was unable to be ascertained by security personnel. <ul>(See security recall for personnel notes.)</c>

<b>[SECURITY RECALL]</c>
<ul>[Note A1a]</c> Device 1 recorded as a foreign generator in the shape of a titration flask. Passed through x-rays safely, though the resulting image was warped.
<ul>[Note A1b]</c> Device 2 unable to be lifted by security personnel. High Court passenger assisted in placing in loading bay. Device appeared to be a solid steel cube with no discernible markings.
<ul>[Note A1c]</c> Individual requested Device 3 not be passed through x-ray terminal. Recorded as 'additional helmet'.
<ul>[Note A1d]</c> Device 4 recorded as a chest filled with elemental samples.

drifter.endQuote: ...and so she left, hands cold and still hungry.
drifter.description: The <y>Drifter</c> is a resourceful brawler with a uniquely supportive playstyle. Generate <y>scrap</c> with <y>Blunt Force</c> and <y>Suffocate</c> in order to <y>Salvage</c> them into a powerful bundle of temporary items for you or your allies.
drifter.name: Drifter
drifter.story:
<ul>Passenger Details:
<y>[Civilian Class]

<ul>Luggage & Equipment:</c>
Passenger boarded with a 2023 A-series generic spacesuit rated for civilian travel and minor vaccuum resistance. Passenger was warned about their suit reaching EOL and was allowed onboard with a red stamp on their passport. For security reasons, passenger was patted down due to their coat appearing oversized*. Passenger attempted to board with 3 backpacks and 2 duffel bags. After being informed that their carry-on limit was one container, they dropped the additional bags and quickly passed through the terminal. A manual search showed that the remaining backpack contained various pieces of scrap metal, opened food containers, and multiple small tools.

<b>[SECURITY RECALL]</c>
<ul>[Event D1]</c> Passenger's travel ticket had it's destination markers destroyed by heavy weathering. Upon questioning, the passenger indicated that 'the full trip would be fine'. Ticket destination manually marked as Contact Light's port of origin.
<ul>[Event D2]</c> Passenger warned by ship personnel to 'stop hiding additional utensils in their pockets' during mealtimes.
drifter.departure:
<y>Departure:</c>
Asteroid Substation Gamma,
Sector 2,
Saturnian Belt

robomando.description: Your <y>Robomando</c> model G comes equipped with everything it needs to <y>extract resources</c> from hostile environments. It's patented <y>RE-WIRE</c> allows instant access to any company sanctioned containers or drone utilities.
robomando.name: ROBOMANDO

unlockable.descArtifactLocked: Artifacts can be found in hidden locations on the planet, enabling alternate game options.

Every bend introduces pain and horrors of the planet.
